main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted on December 17, 1965, at various locations in Alaska.
interesting points: The UFO was described as light grey and triangular, approximately 50-75 feet in length., The sighting was confirmed by Nikolsky., The object appeared to cause a disturbance in the air as if it were smoke., One sighting lasted only 10 seconds with no radar contact confirmed., A military observer reported a circular, white object about 25-30 feet in diameter that ascended rapidly after hovering.
